ActiveAgents - Interface in edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_2.actors
This interface doesn't really do anything other than group Actor subtypes, but was a required part of this program based on the program #2 specification.

Application - Class in edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_2
The purpose of this class is to update the game's logic and change the UI state based on what is occurring in the game.

attemptFlee() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_2.Application
This method decides what state to put the UI into and what message the UI will display based on the outcome of the game's probability based flee function.
attemptPlayerFlee() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_2.Game
Attempts to move player position backwards by 1 based on the value of Player.FLEE_CHANCE
attemptShootEnemy() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_2.Game
Reduces the player's ammo count and makes an attempt based on the probability edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_2.actors.Weapon#accuracy to remove hit points from the enemy based on the damage value edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_2.actors.Weapon#damage of the player's weapon.

attemptSpawnEnemy() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_2.Game
